Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
Reservations & Events
book your reservation
Book your GG's Waterfront reservation on Resy
If you do not find a time or date online,
please call the restaurant at
(954) 929-7030
and speak to a reservationist
.
Host your next party with us.
Celebrate your next special occasion at GG’s Waterfront, offering an elevated coastal dining experience. Your guests will enjoy our seasonal menu, offering fresh florida seafood, vegetables, and steaks along with an award-winning wine selection. Our sunset views of Hollywood’s North Lake paired with our warm hospitality and service make for some of the most memorable events in South Florida dining.
From private dockside dining to our upscale Sunset Room, we offer an array of indoor, outdoor, private, and semi-private options. We are happy to accommodate groups of 12 - 300+ with menu options to suit any occasion. Let us make your next event one to remember.
Our Events Director is available to help thoughtfully coordinate the details of your event. Please fill out the form below for more details about availability, packages, and pricing; or call
(954) 929-4237
.
Download PDF
FAQs
● Do you have private dining rooms?
Yes, we have our Private Sunset Room that seats just over 100 guests. We also offer a more intimate space with the Wine
Cellar that seats up to 14 guests.
● Am I required to use a pre-set menu for my group reservation?
To ensure quality service we require pre-set menus for groups of 14 or more.
● How soon can I access my reserved space?
Reservations in the main dining room can access the reserved space 15 minutes prior to the reservation time whereas private dining rooms have scheduled windows of availability.
● Can I bring in decorations?
You may bring small table top decorations such as flowers, name cards, runners. We do not allow balloons, glitter, or confetti
and nothing can be tacked/hung from the walls or ceilings. For any additional requests please discuss directly with the Events
Director.
● Is there a deposit for my reservation?
Yes, the deposit is 50% of the estimated event cost.
● Can I bring a cake or dessert(s)?
If you book with the events team, you may bring in a cake or dessert(s). There will be a $4 per person per item fee added to
your final bill. As an alternative, we are happy to offer our on-site Pastry Chef to prepare a custom cake and or dessert(s). Feel
free to ask about this while planning your event.
Book your party now

Justine Gall
Director of Events
Justine is a dynamic meeting planner with a decade of experience in the events industry. Originally from Vancouver, Canada, she relocated in 2022 to South Florida and continues to thrive in the event space.
